title: How to Make a Pancake Shot

steps.headline: Pour the Frangelico into a shot glass.
Pour the sugar into a small saucer or bowl.
Serve with a lemon wedge on a side plate.
Dip the lemon wedge into the sugar.
Drink the Frangelico.
steps.description: At the same time, bite into the sugared lemon and suck.

text: Preparation Pour the Frangelico into a shot glass.  Pour the sugar into a small saucer or bowl.  Serve with a lemon wedge on a side plate.  Drinking the pancake shot Dip the lemon wedge into the sugar.  Drink the Frangelico. At the same time, bite into the sugared lemon and suck. Repeat!
